Books in My Library
What is this?
On your request nothing has been found

Welcome to My Library!

We've gathered all the books you've ever been interested in (read online, downloaded, saved to favourites, etc.) in one place. This feature will help you better organize your books and avoid searching for them across different sections. Filter, add tags, and sort your book collection by title, author, and other criteria.

My Library contains books:
  • Favorites
  • DownloadedComing soon
  • BooklistsComing soon
  • Tagged books
ocean underwater world fishing
Organize and filter books with new colorful tags!

About your plan

Dear Booklover, thank you for being a user of our library! Did you know that for a donation, you can not only increase your daily download limit but also get access to even more useful features?

Will reset in
Downloads Daily Limit
Compare features

Daily downloads

More search results

Send-to-Pocketbook
One-click download

Donations of*:

  • $1-$4.99 will grant you access to all features without extending downloads limit (during next 31 days);
  • $5-$9.99 will improve limit to 15 downloads per day during next 31 days;
  • $10-$19.99 will improve limit to 30 downloads per day during next 31 days;
  • more $20 will improve limit to 50 (+3 for each additional USD) downloads per day during next 31 days;
  • $100 and more will improve limit to 999 downloads per day during next 31 days.

Explore the library

Create booklists and share your book recommendations with others!

Booklists are your personal themed book collections that you can share with the community. Molecular biology, English detectives, contemporary art, UX design, programming languages, etc., what topic is most familiar to you?

Add books to your personal collection
Share a link to your collection with the community
